headline.main: FINNS CLAIM CITY IN SOVIET KARELIA; Report Petrozavodsk Captured -- Air-Borne Nazis Pierce Crimean Defense Lines FINNS CLAIM CITY IN SOVIET KARELIA

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Oct. 1 -- Germany reported progress today at both ends of the Eastern Front, sharing her claims in the north with Finnish forces, which announced the capture of Petrozavodsk, and in the south with the Italians, who are bolstering the push across the Ukraine.
abstract: Finns claim Petrozavodsk, eastern Karelia, captured; Itals aid Germans, Kharkov drive; Germans shell Kronstadt naval base; Germans admit USSR air superiority but claim, USSR air toll greater than German
